.. _plan:

Plan of ECProduct
=================

Schedule of Development
-----------------------

.. Use the funciton of "Automatically export after saving" of the tool "ToDoList" to get csv data file.
   Refer to http://www.abstractspoon.com/wiki/doku.php?id=file-action-prefs#autoexrelated_information_under_preferences

   The generated csv file has one more column, and results in one empty column(last column) in table of html page. 
   This is a bug of this tool.

.. csv-table:: **Schedule of Development**
   :header-rows: 1
   :widths: auto
   :stub-columns: 2
   :file: ecproduct.csv
   :delim: U+0009
   :encoding: utf-16le
